title: Awaiting response.
body: Submitted a ticket 2 hours ago. Looking to get a response soon.

replies.body:
Tickets are answered on a first-come-first-served basis, so it will be a bit before we get to you. Additionally, because there have been a lot of tickets submitted recently, a reply may take a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I understand that. Just is an issue that could be fixed in the time it took you to reply to this thread. No worries, though. Only 1 game left, anyway.
